title: headline fonts to pair with gotham rounded
content: I am searching for a headline and sub-headline font for ads for a technology brand. Their body copy font is gotham rounded. Has anyone discovered a nice typeface pairing for Gotham rounded?
author: salisae

comments.content: Depends on the rest of the branding, but I'd try Whitney bold or PMN Caecilia 85 Heavy.
Depends on the rest of the branding, but I'd try Whitney bold or PMN Caecilia 85 Heavy.
Whitney is on my list. Thank you for the input, paul.

Depends on how wild you want to get.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20141109082938im_/http:/typophile.com/files/earth_ad_003_5450.jpg)

Probably not what you are looking for...
